scripts.dev: concurrently "sass Styles:Styles --no-source-map -w " "npx tailwindcss -i .\Styles\app.css -o .\wwwroot\css\app.css --minify --watch " "npx tailwindcss -i .\obj\Debug\net7.0\scopedcss\bundle\BlazeWind.styles.css  -o .\obj\Debug\net7.0\scopedcss\bundle\BlazeWind.styles.css --minify --watch " "cross-env DOTNET_WATCH_RESTART_ON_RUDE_EDIT=1 dotnet watch"
